room_title: Escape room "Pirate Captives" by 11th Hour Escape in Corpus Christi
review: Great time with family and brand new friends! This was our first escape room experience. We are hooked!! New beginner level record in the Pirate room!

room_title: Escape room "Pirate Captives" by 11th Hour Escape in Corpus Christi
review: Went with my friends for my birthday and had a great time in the Pirate room. We will definitely be back with a group of friends to try out their other room. Enjoyed meeting with the owners afterwards. Great fun for groups of all ages.
